channel.title: Wat do u do if the owner of the surver steals ur acc cause its so good?
channel.description: i was playin on the surver got to the max lvl of 253. i had lik 399pk points and killed som1 and got a pair of boots so i put them on and they said i had 190 boots on so i was lik awsome an award for pk points! i had them on got n a fite and hit a 135 (the most hp u can hav). i did it nfront of an admin and he wanted w/e i had to make me hit that high. i said no i earned it u can get it urself so he said somting bout im gonna ban u if u dont. i said go for it im gonna talk to owner. i talked to owner he said it is a glitch i need to get on ur acc to get it off. i was lik heck no u aint getin on me acc. then he gave me the this is serious bisness that wer talkin here if u dont im gonna hav to ban ur acc. so i figured ur the owner u can b trusted. then he got on and changed pass. i asked him 4 it back lik 50 times. he wont giv it back. the only thing i dont lik is that hes got my name which is "urmom2" hes tellin that im tryin to copy him but i am a proud mod of bropkscape.no-ip.info i just dont want him runing my name. i worked hard i got that name on 3 other survers. and fatal and suspect of legionscape.servegame.org r the ones who stole it. i recommened all ppl stay away from them for they r not good ppl they r well fags. so tell me wat u think of them and if u think i should get my acc back. =]

item.title: Wat do u do if the owner of the surver steals ur acc cause its so good?
item.dc:creator: @King_Dawgs King_Dawgs
item.description:
@King_Dawgs wrote:

Hey i witnessed [were u urmom] because thats harsh and it shall not be taken ill take it up with azn

Read full topic
